semantic_identifier: [GOLD-11]: Setup Data Quality: Add one-click auto-fixes for common Fit Driver input issues
title: Setup Data Quality: Add one-click auto-fixes for common Fit Driver input issues

sections.text: In the setup Data Quality panel, add actionable “Fix” controls for the most common issues blocking clean Fit Driver inputs (trim whitespace, normalize casing, collapse empty-string-to-null, and map common enum synonyms like “mid market” vs “Mid-Market”). Apply fixes to the workspace’s normalization rules so they persist for future ingests and downstream fit scoring uses the cleaned values. Ensure the panel shows a before/after preview on a small sample and allows reverting changes before finalizing setup.
